io.spine.server.rejection

Class RejectionBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.bus.Bus<M,E,C,D>
      • io.spine.server.bus.MulticastBus<M,E,C,D>
        • io.spine.server.outbus.CommandOutputBus<io.spine.core.Rejection,io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope,io.spine.core.RejectionClass,RejectionDispatcher<?>>
          • io.spine.server.rejection.RejectionBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RejectionBus
extends CommandOutputBus<io.spine.core.Rejection,io.spine.core.RejectionEnvelope,io.spine.core.RejectionClass,RejectionDispatcher<?>>
    Dispatches the business rejections that occur during the command processing to the corresponding subscriber.
    See Also:
    ThrowableMessage, Rejections, @Subscribe

      • post

        public final void post(io.spine.core.Rejection rejection)
        Posts the rejection to this bus instance.

        This method should be used if the callee does not need to follow the acknowledgement responses. Otherwise, an alternative method should be used.

        Parameters:
        rejection - the business rejection to deliver to the dispatchers.
        See Also:
        Bus.post(Message, StreamObserver)
